Title: Establishes the vacant rental improvement program
Summary: Establishes the vacant rental improvement program to provide grants of up to $75,000 per unit to owners of buildings with five or fewer units.
LawCode: Add Art 33 §§1300 & 1301, Priv Hous Fin L; add §99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the vacant rental improvement program
